name: Strong Native Workforce
description: Provides individual and group support with finding jobs, paying for education, accessing training for different job skills, and workshops to develop resumes. Can help you with: - Job Placement - Career Counseling - Job Training - Workshops - Support Services
fullDescription: Provides individual and group support with finding jobs, paying for education, accessing training for different job skills, and workshops to develop resumes. Can help you with: - Job Placement - Career Counseling - Job Training - Workshops - Support Services
whatTheyOffer: Provides individual and group support with finding jobs, paying for education, accessing training for different job skills, and workshops to develop resumes. Can help you with: - Job Placement - Career Counseling - Job Training - Workshops - Support Services
howToGetIt: To learn if you qualify for our services, fill out our pre-intake form. For questions, please email us at workforcedevelopment@nativehealth.org.
